compliance_assessment.framework_description: General Data Protection Regulation, a regulation in EU law on data protection and privacy.

requirements.requirement: Ensure lawful processing of personal data.
requirements.evidence: Data processing agreements are in place but lack clarity on lawful bases.
recommendations: Document all data processing activities comprehensively

requirements.requirement: Implement data subject rights (access, rectification, erasure).
requirements.evidence: No established processes for handling data subject requests.
gaps: No procedures for data access requests
No mechanisms for data deletion requests
recommendations: Develop and implement procedures for data subject requests
Train staff on data subject rights

requirements.requirement: Ensure data security and breach notification.
requirements.evidence: Basic security measures are in place, but no formal breach notification process.
gaps: No incident response plan for data breaches
recommendations: Establish a formal breach notification process
Conduct regular security assessments and audits

critical_gaps: Lack of explicit consent mechanisms for data processing
No established procedures for data subject rights
Absence of a formal breach notification process
remediation_plan: Implement consent management tools to ensure lawful data processing.
Develop and document procedures for data subject requests.
Create an incident response plan that includes breach notification procedures.
